1.9.name: wordpress/knr-author-list-widget
1.9.description: The KNR Author List Widget plugin, by Nitin Reddy Katkam, displays a list of authors, and editors on the blog as an ordered list, unordered list, or a dropdown list. You can use the ordered list to display a list of 'top authors' on the blog.

2.0.4.name: wordpress/knr-author-list-widget
